name: topaz
desc: a lower quality gem but still worth something

name: emerald
desc: a gem with a captivating green aura

name: diamond
desc: a gem appraised higher than most

name: opal
desc: a multicolored cut gem, might get you a few coins

name: jet
desc: this gem mirrors the pitch black of the corners of this room

name: loose brick
desc: Seems like this place isn't well kept

name: health potion
desc: a potion used by most adventurers when a cleric isn't around

name: bread
desc: A loaf of bread, looks a bit stale

name: coin
desc: A coin that seems to be older than the castle and from a land you don't know.

name: note
desc: A note warning you that this castle is not what it seems.

name: wine
desc: An ancient brand of wine that you wonder might still be good.

name: portrait
desc: A large painting of someone of prominence

name: tobacco
desc: How long have people been smoking?!!?

name: emblem
desc: An emblem similar to your own but much older.
